sense.gloss: serving customers, looking after visitors, reception

sdata.j: |↑接客|↑↓せっきゃく↓がなっとらん。
|↑接客|↑↓せっきゃく↓は↑苦手↑↓にがて↓なの。
sdata.e: It is a fact that I'm poor at customer service.

sdata.j: |↑接客|↑↓せっきゃく↓は↑苦手↑↓にがて↓なの。
|↑接客|↑↓せっきゃく↓↑業↑↓ぎょう↓は↑好↑↓す↓きじゃないんだ。
sdata.e: I don't like the customer service industry.

sdata.j: トムは、|↑接客|↑↓せっきゃく↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓かったためすぐにクビになった。
sdata.e: Due to his impolite behavior toward a customer, Tom was immediately fired.
